pages.text: aur isi tarah hum ne aap ki taraf apne hukm se ruh ko utaara hai, aap us se pehle ye bhi nahi jaante thein ke kitaab aur imaan kya cheez hai? lekin hum ne ose noor banaya, us ke zariye se apne bandho mein se jise chaahte hai hidaayath dete hai, beshak aap raahe raasth ki rehnumaayi kar rahe hai
us Allah ki raah ki jis ki milkiyath mein asmaano aur zameen ki har cheez hai, agaah raho, sab kaam Allah ta’ala hee ki taraf lauthte hai
qasam hai is waazeh kitaab ki
hum ne is ko arabi zabaan ka Qur’aan banaya hai ke tum samajh lo
yaqinan ye lauhe mehfooz mein hai aur hamaare nazdeek bulandh martaba hikmath waali hai
kya hum is nasihath ko tum se is bina par hata le ke tum hadh se guzar jaane waale log ho
aur hum ne agle logo mein bhi kitne hee nabi bheje
jo nabi un ke paas aaya unhone us ka mazaaq udaaya
pas hum ne un se zyaada zoor aawaro ko tabaah kar daala aur aglo ki misaal guzar chuki hai
agar aap un se daryaaft kare ke asmaano aur zameen ko kis ne payda kiya to yaqinan un ka jawaab yahi hoga ke unhe ghaalib wa daana (Allah) ne hee payda kiya hai
wahi hai jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko farsh (bichona) banaya aur us mein tumhaare liye raaste kar diye, ta ke tum raah pa liya karo
